H0.text: Which one word appeared as main headline news on the front page of the Sun newspaper the day after the sinking of the Belgrano in May 1982 . Sunk

H1.text: Which one word appeared as main headline news on the front page of the Sun newspaper the day after the sinking of the Belgrano in May 1982 . Torpedoed

H2.text: Which one word appeared as main headline news on the front page of the Sun newspaper the day after the sinking of the Belgrano in May 1982 . Belgrano

H3.text: Which one word appeared as main headline news on the front page of the Sun newspaper the day after the sinking of the Belgrano in May 1982 . Gotcha

A4.text: The Sun was criticised for its 'Gotcha' headline following the sinking of the ARA General Belgrano.
